'''0.0.15a''' (Multiplayer Test 2) is a version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released on June 3, 2009, at 18:16 UTC.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''[12:16] * Notch changes topic to 'http://www.minecraft.net/  |  The multiplayer test is up and running again at http://www.minecraft.net/mptest/index.jsp  |  I'd really appreciate it if you could log in and run around so I have something to test against.''" (18:16 UTC)</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Steve JE1.png|40px]] [[File:Old human mob walking animation.gif|40px]] [[Mob (entity)|Mob]]'''
* Changed the animation, but the animation plays too fast.<ref name=":0">[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''[12:18] <Zolyx> whoa, the animation on the mobs is a little... out ;)''", "''[12:18] <Zolyx> it's like 5000% faster than it should be. they look like they're spazzing :P''" (18:18 UTC)</ref>{{more info|Was this added in this version? maybe}}

=== Non-mob entities ===
'''[[Player]]'''
* Changed the animation, but the animation plays too fast.<ref name=":0" />
